infos.value: We were only able to escape the castle because Schuzelt stayed behind.
Do you want his sacrifice to be for naught?
Your concerns are well understood, but there was no other choice.
We cannot remain here for long, lest we be surrounded again.
There will be countless other cruel choices to be made hereafter.
It is...the only way we can open a path to Leonis's restoration.
This is bad! We're still being pursued!
